trans-unit.source: Represents the information for a contract operation defined in a workflow service.
trans-unit.target: Representa as informações de uma operação do contrato definida num serviço de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The OperationInfo class is used to define service contract information for a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]A classe de OperationInfo é utilizada para definir as informações de contrato de serviço para um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity>atividade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The OperationInfo class can be used only with a workflow-first service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > OperationInfo a classe pode ser utilizado apenas com um serviço de fluxo de trabalho primeiro.

trans-unit.source: For more information about workflow-first services, see [Workflow Service Authoring Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/995bf98e-5b51-4c49-802b-c4e6293dd530).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os serviços do primeiro do fluxo de trabalho, consulte [estilos de criação de serviço de fluxo de trabalho](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/995bf98e-5b51-4c49-802b-c4e6293dd530).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When activities are deserialized from Xoml, the constructors for the associated properties are called automatically.
trans-unit.target: Quando as atividades são anular a serialização do Xoml, os construtores para as propriedades associadas são denominados automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the object.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia do objeto.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a deep copy of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo> object, with the same <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.ContractName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.IsOneWay%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.Parameters%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.ProtectionLevel%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: Este método cria uma cópia profunda a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo>objeto, com o mesmo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.ContractName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.IsOneWay%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.Parameters%2A>, e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.ProtectionLevel%2A>valores.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.ProtectionLevel%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.Parameters%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.IsOneWay%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.ContractName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The copy of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A cópia do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the full name of the contract that defines this operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome completo do contrato que define esta operação.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the full name of the contract that defines the operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa o nome completo do contrato que define a operação.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two object instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se as duas instâncias de objeto são iguais.

trans-unit.source: This operation compares the values of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.ContractName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.IsOneWay%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.Parameters%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.ProtectionLevel%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: Esta operação compara os valores de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.ContractName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.IsOneWay%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.Parameters%2A>, e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.ProtectionLevel%2A>valores.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.ProtectionLevel%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.Parameters%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.IsOneWay%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.ContractName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para a comparação com a atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: to indicate that the current and obj are equal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: para indicar que o atual e obj são igual; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um código hash para o atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets information on whether or not the operation has a defined <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém informações sobre se pretende ou não a operação tem um definido <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether or not the operation has a <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de Booleano indicando se a operação tem um <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"> </xref> associados à mesma.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets information on the operation to specify that communication between the service and a client is one-way.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a informação sobre a operação para especificar que a comunicação entre o serviço e um cliente é unidirecional.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation supports one-way communication; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a operação suporta comunicação unidirecional; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo"></xref> objects that represents the parameter definitions used by the operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo"> </xref> objetos que representa as definições de parâmetro utilizadas pela operação.

trans-unit.source: The `Parameters` collection will contain one element for each parameter in the method signature of the operation, plus one element for the return value of the operation.
trans-unit.target: O `Parameters` coleção irá conter um elemento para cada um dos parâmetros da assinatura do método da operação, mais um elemento para o valor devolvido da operação.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo"></xref> objects that represents the parameter definitions used by the operation when called by a client.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo"> </xref> objetos que representa as definições de parâmetros utilizadas pela operação quando chamado por um cliente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref> of an operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"> </xref> de uma operação.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `null`, which means that the protection level is not set.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é `null`, que significa que o nível de proteção não está definido.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref> object used by the operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"> </xref> objeto utilizado pela operação.

trans-unit.source: Provides a string that represents this instance.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma cadeia que representa esta instância.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.ContractName%2A> value if extant; otherwise, it returns the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase.Name%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.ContractName%2A>valor se extant; caso contrário, devolve a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase.Name%2A>valor.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase.Name%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.ContractName%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa esta instância.
